====Definitions====
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[eat]]; to [[consume]]
#: {{zh-x|他 很 喜歡 吃飯。|He loves to '''eat'''.}}
#: {{zh-x|你 吃飯 了 嗎？|Have you eaten? (also a greeting)}}
#* {{zh-x|你 吃 過 飯 嗎？|Have you eaten? (also a greeting)}}
#* {{zh-x|儂 飯 吃 過 了 𠲎？|Have you eaten? (also a greeting)|SH}}
# to [[live on]]
# to [[suffer]]; to [[endure]]; to [[bear]]
#: {{zh-x|吃苦|to endure hardship}}
#: {{zh-x|吃虧|to suffer losses, to be at a disadvantage}}
#* {{zh-x|他 胸口 吃 了 一 槍。|He '''took''' a bullet in the chest.}}
# to [[exhaust]]; to be a strain
# to [[drink]]
